author: Keith Rozario
content:
Yes Brandon, sorry for that.

If you download the scripts and run them on your own server they should work. I've stopped hosting with dreamhost and no longer have an unlimited bandwidth host to run the script on.

You can also try minus.com, which is pretty decent.

Amazon S3 and dropbox are obviously the kings in this area.

Sorry about that, contact me via email if you want more info.
